summary: AN ACCIDENT OCCURRED WHEN THE CONSUMER USED THE CRUISE CONTROL WHILE IT WAS RAINING.  THE VEHICLE HYDROPLANED.  THE CONSUMER WAS TOLD BY THE POLICE OFFICER THAT SHE SHOULD NOT USE THIS FEATURE ON A WET SURFACE.  THERE WAS A SUGGESTION MADE THAT THERE SHOULD BE A STICKER POSTED ON THE WINDOW FORM THE MANUFACTURER.  SCC   *JB
